rows.label: qst702604_msg0001
rows.name:
A machine for discovering buried
treasure in the Dannagh Desert?!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0002
rows.name:
One could use all the resources Iira
has at its disposal and not come close
to constructing a machine like this.

rows.label: qst702604_msg0003
rows.name:
Though, when salvage is considered,
I suppose you cannot say that it is
definitively impossible.

rows.label: qst702604_msg0005
rows.name:
Leave it with me and I shall deliver to
you the...Gennai Goldamatron 5000!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0007
rows.name: Yes, he seems like a stable fellow

rows.label: qst702604_msg0008
rows.name: No, I don't think that's a good idea

rows.label: qst702604_msg0009
rows.name:
Woop woop! I present to you the
Gennai Goldamatron 5000!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0010
rows.name:
Right, off you toddle to the Dannagh
Desert to try it out!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0012
rows.name:
I am completely confident in its
ability to deliver! Hee hoo hoo!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0014
rows.name:
Think again, you unappreciators
of genius!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0015
rows.name:
Who else would you entrust with this
task but I, the greatest inventor in
the capital - no, the country?!

rows.label: qst702604_msg0101
rows.name:
Right, off you toddle to the Dannagh
Desert to put the Gennai Goldamatron
5000 through its paces!
